original_request:
EXCELLENT! The SafeConnect codebase is already very mature! I found: 
- LOGIN: LoginScreen.kt, RegisterScreen.kt (DONE)
- CHARACTER CREATOR: CharacterProfile.kt, CharacterQuizScreen.kt, CharacterRepository.kt, CharacterSheet.kt (DONE)
- TAVERN DISCOVERY: DiscoverScreen.kt, TavernBackground.kt, TavernComponents.kt (DONE)
- MATCHES/CHAT: MatchesScreen.kt, ChatScreen.kt (DONE)
- SAFECONNECT DATES: SafeConnectScreen.kt, SafetyRepository.kt, Adventures screens (DONE)
- MINI GAMES: 15+ game screens already built!
- NAVIGATION: Full bottom nav and drawer menu

Most of the features from the plan are ALREADY IMPLEMENTED! Can you review what's still missing or needs improvement for production readiness?
